End-User License Agreement for Comet

Important: please read the terms and conditions of this license agreement carefully before continuing with this program install:
Pr. Sidi HAMADY's End-User License Agreement ("EULA") is a legal agreement between you (either an individual or a single entity) and Pr. Sidi HAMADY for the software identified above
which may include associated software components, media, printed materials, and "online" or electronic documentation.
By installing, copying, or otherwise using Comet, you agree to be bound by the terms of this EULA. This license agreement represents the entire agreement concerning the program
between you and Pr. Sidi HAMADY, (referred to as "licenser"), and it supersedes any prior proposal, representation, or understanding between the parties.
If you do not agree to the terms of this EULA, do not install or use Comet.

Comet is protected by copyright laws and international copyright treaties, as well as other intellectual property laws and treaties. Comet is licensed, not sold.

1. GRANT OF LICENSE.
Comet is licensed as follows:
(a) Installation and Use.
Pr. Sidi HAMADY grants you the right to install and use copies of Comet on your computer running a validly licensed copy of the operating system for which Comet was designed. Comet is free of charge only for non-commercial use.
(b) Backup Copies.
You may also make copies of Comet as may be necessary for backup and archival purposes.

2. DESCRIPTION OF OTHER RIGHTS AND LIMITATIONS.
(a) Maintenance of Copyright Notices.
You must not remove or alter any copyright notices on any and all copies of Comet.
(b) Distribution.
The redistribution of Comet or any of its components is not allowed. The only way to install and use the software is to download a copy from Android Market,
Google Play or Pr. Sidi HAMADY website: http://www.hamady.org.
(c) Prohibition on Reverse Engineering, Decompilation, and Disassembly.
You may not reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble Comet, except and only to the extent that such activity is expressly permitted by applicable law notwithstanding this limitation. 
(d) Rental.
You may not rent, lease, or lend Comet.
(e) Compliance with Applicable Laws.
You must comply with all applicable laws regarding use of Comet.

3. TERMINATION
Without prejudice to any other rights, Pr. Sidi HAMADY may terminate this EULA if you fail to comply with the terms and conditions of this EULA. In such event, you must destroy all
copies of Comet in your possession.

4. COPYRIGHT
All title, including but not limited to copyrights, in and to Comet and any copies thereof are owned by Pr. Sidi HAMADY or its suppliers. All title and intellectual property
rights in and to the content which may be accessed through use of Comet is the property of the respective content owner and may be protected by applicable copyright or other
intellectual property laws and treaties. This EULA grants you no rights to use such content. All rights not expressly granted are reserved by Pr. Sidi HAMADY


5. NO WARRANTIES
Pr. Sidi HAMADY expressly disclaims any warranty for Comet. Comet is provided 'As Is' without any express or implied warranty of any kind, including but not limited to
any warranties of merchantability, noninfringement, or fitness of a particular purpose. Pr. Sidi HAMADY does not warrant or assume responsibility for the accuracy or completeness of
any information, text, graphics, links or other items contained within Comet. Pr. Sidi HAMADY makes no warranties respecting any harm that may be caused by the transmission of
a computer virus, worm, time bomb, logic bomb, or other such computer program. Pr. Sidi HAMADY further expressly disclaims any warranty or representation to Authorized Users or to
any third party.

6. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
In no event shall Pr. Sidi HAMADY be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, lost profits, business interruption, or lost information) rising out of 'Authorized Users'
use of or inability to use Comet, even if Pr. Sidi HAMADY has been advised of the possibility of such damages. In no event will Pr. Sidi HAMADY be liable for loss of data or 
for indirect, special, incidental, consequential (including lost profit), or other damages based in contract, tort or otherwise. Pr. Sidi HAMADY shall have no liability with respect
to the content of Comet or any part thereof, including but not limited to errors or omissions contained therein, libel, infringements of rights of publicity, privacy, trademark
rights, business interruption, personal injury, loss of privacy, moral rights or the disclosure of confidential information.
